original_title: Litro reduces LP Gas prices : 12.5 kg cylinder reduced by Rs. 1,005/-
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Litro Gas announced that the price of a 12.5 kg LP Gas cylinder will be reduced by Rs. 1,005/- with effect from midnight on Tuesday (4). The new price of a 12.5 kg LP Gas cylinder will be Rs. 3,738/-.
In addition, a 5 kg LP Gas cylinder will be reduced by Rs. 402/- and the new price will be Rs. 1,502/-.
A 2.3 kg LP Gas cylinder will be reduced by Rs. 183/- and the new price will be Rs. 7,00/-.
